page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT IN STOURBRIDGE
page.content: Out of approximately 2,000 school leavers in the Stourbridge area, 1,000 (50%) of them go on the{Y.T.S. (Youth {Training Scheme)},600 go for further education, and 400 go on the dole. Altogether 16%-20% of the adults in Stourbridge are unemployed. The most popular jobs in this area for the girls, involve children or animals, and the favourite boys jobs are mechanics and builders. After the Y.T.S. is completed, at least 50% of each group is able to get a job involving their chosen career. {Unemployment figures Every first Tuesday in the month, the unemployment figures are added up in Stourbridge are sent to Dudley, then to a clearing office and finally to the Secretary of State, who announces the total in the House of Commons.
